verses.text:
Eternal light of love divine, In Jesus, God with us, displayed, How bright thy
beaming glory shines! How wide thy healing streams are spread!

With whom dost thou delight to dwell?
Sinners, a vile, thankless race!
O God, what tongue aright can tell
How vast thy love, how great thy grace?

The humble souls that seek thy face,
With thy salvation blest, shall prove
The sweet delight of thy sovereign will
With joy our grateful hearts receive;
All thy commands we would fulfill,
Lord, all we are, to thee we give.

To thy benign, indulgent care,
Our flesh, soul, spirit, we would bring;
O let thy sacred presence there
And soul the blessed tribute bring!
